biotools.summary:
Detects duplicate or visually similar DICOM series using a tiered approach that combines metadata analysis, hash-based comparison, and pixel-level similarity metrics.
Ideal for:
1. High-level series comparison and classification, and
2. Detecting duplicates even after post-processing (e.g., denoising, filtering).

For scenarios requiring strict, image-level deduplication based solely on pixel content, fully agnostic to metadata changes introduced through anonymization, consider using [link]
